ignorePaths.description: An array of path patterns to ignore. Certain paths are always ignored such as .git or .svn paths.

ignoreExtensions.description: An array of file extensions to ignore. Certain file extensions such as image files (png, gif, jpg, etc) are always ignored.

ignoreScanners.description: An array of scanner name slugs to ignore. For example `["sqlinjection", "xss", "pathtraversal"]` would ignore or omit the results of the SQL Injection Scanner the Cross Site Scripting (XSS) Scanner and the Path Traversal scanner.

minSeverity.description: Default: low - The minimum severity level that will be flagged. Set this to high if you only care about severe issues.

minConfidence.description: Default: high - The minimum confidence level that will be flagged. Issues with low confidence will be more likely to be false positives.

ignorePatterns.description: Some applications may have their own functions for safely encoding variables to prevent Cross Site Scripting (XSS).

engines.description: An array of CFML engines that the code runs on.

includeScanners.description: An array of scanner ids which to use, all other scanners will be ignored.
